page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: There are few leisure amenities in our area and those that do exist cater mainly for sport. Most leisure activities are therefore home-based with only a few local people prepared to travel to the larger towns to seek amenities. Television is by far the most popular leisure activity with almost all the population watching for several hours each evening. The increasing popularity of video recorders has increased the numbers choosing home entertainment and many local shops now offer a video film hiring service. For the younger generation the area has little to offer with only the local public houses offering any leisure amenities. To find any wider choice of entertainment they must travel to Camborne or Penzance.
